title: EBSI Verifiable Accreditation Record
description: Schema of an EBSI Verifiable Accreditation Record

credentialSubject.description: Defines additional information about the subject that is described by the Verifiable Accreditation

authorizationClaims.description: Defines a list of claims that define/determine the authorization of an Issuer to issue certain types of VCs

credentialSchemaId.description: a list of Schemas, registered in Trusted  Schemas Registry, which the accredited organisation is allowed to issue, as per their accreditation.
